Text:
Great seed!! Thx a bunch :)
And now for the request: Romeo and Juliet from 1968, the one directed by Franco Zeffirelli. I have no idea if this is something of the BBC but it's worth a try...
How about the BBC's Taming of the Shrew, with John Cleese?

oh wow. thanks.
how about Hamlet w/richard burton, directed by Gielgud?
Possible to get hold of the Laurence Olivier King Lear?  thanks
this is some goooooood stuff right here

Thanks Daniel.  This is REALLY great stuff.  Do you have the Michael Horden [as King Lear] version ?
Thanks

I'm going to have a day of Lear if I can get this from any seeders who are still graciously seeding......?

My plan of attack then is to start with James Earl Jonesl, move on to Paul Scofield, then hit up Laurence Olivier, then Godard & Kurosawa's interpretations, then listen to both John Gielgud & Alec Guinness's audio adaptations and finally finish with Iam MacKellen's '08 version.

Cheers in advance all!
